name: Twitter – Sleek Dark
description: This is, as you may see, a sleek and darker version of Twitter. !!! Please Read !!! This userstyle is a work in progress, it will finish over time. If you find something that I have missed, please let me know! Please leave a rating if you liked the userstyle! Your Feedback is Highly Appreciated! Be sure to check out my other userstyles! http://userstyles.org/users/92431
